links.title: Fanaticism, Blurred reality and Risk Management
links.description: 1. Most traders, bulls & bears alike (especially those on some of the speculative stock-forums on Twitter and StockTwits) seem fanatical and emotionally charged. When we are fanatical and frenzied, the reality gets blurred. It is always good to keep a watch on the market sentiment & respect the price action instead of simply trading...
